People Who Help Me Make Career Decision

06 Dec 2013

Career transition is as difficult as you might have imagined. Thankfully from some great minds on the internet, I learn a lot. Here I share them with you .

  1. <How to do what you love> - Essay by Paul Graham Paul Graham talks about why work can be fun and how can you might find one you love.

  2. Oliver Emberton from Quora writes about understanding and getting the most from life, some of his writings that help me a lot:

    • <Closing Gaps>, he writes about why we should stop making scary big decisions and start closing gaps between our desires and your current situation.
    • <How to master your time> And many of his best articles here.
